item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: z0iqo
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: z0iqo
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://queencitysurfacecoatings.com.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: jonlan
item.content:encoded:
About Us

About Queen City Surface Coatings

Veteran-Owned Excellence in Surface Coatings

Founded in 2025 by John Leonard, who brings over a decade of corporate sales and marketing experience to the surface coating industry. This business expertise ensures every Queen City Surface Coatings project is managed professionally with clear communication, competitive pricing, and exceptional results.

Based in Milford, Ohio, we serve the Cincinnati tri-state area with premium epoxy flooring, concrete polishing, and surface restoration solutions. Our customer-focused approach and attention to detail delivers lasting results that exceed expectations.

The Team

Our Experts

John Leonard

Owner

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: z0iqo
item.content:encoded:
Transform Your Floor

Premium Floor Coatings

Founded in 2025, Queen City Surface Coatings LLC brings professional expertise and military precision to every project. As a veteran-owned business operated by John Leonard, a U.S. Marine Corps veteran based in Milford, Ohio, we serve the entire Cincinnati tri-state area with pride, dedication, and unwavering commitment to excellence.

Our Services Contact US

Transform Your Space

Professional Quality You Can Trust

Founded in 2025 by veteran John Leonard, we bring meticulous attention to detail to every epoxy flooring project. Licensed, bonded, and insured for your peace of mind.

GET FREE ESTIMATE

2025

Founded & Growing

3

States Served

50+

Mile Service Area

100%

Satisfaction Guarantee

Our Services

Professional Floor Coatings

View All

Residential Epoxy Floors

Transform your garage, basement, or patio with durable, beautiful epoxy coatings. Custom colors and decorative options available to match your style and needs.

Commercial Solutions

Professional-grade coatings for businesses that need durability, safety, and style. Perfect for retail spaces, restaurants, and office buildings.

Industrial Coatings

Heavy-duty systems designed for manufacturing, warehouses, and high-traffic industrial environments with extreme chemical resistance.

Concrete Polishing

Professional concrete polishing services that create smooth, glossy surfaces perfect for modern commercial and residential spaces.

Surface Restoration

Repair and restore damaged concrete surfaces before applying new coatings. We handle cracks, stains, and surface preparation.

Custom Design

Create unique floors with metallic finishes, decorative flakes, and custom color combinations tailored to your vision and space.

Quality Guarantee

Committed To Excellence In Every Project

Every Queen City Surface Coatings project is backed by our commitment to quality craftsmanship, professional installation, and complete customer satisfaction.

FREE ESTIMATE

Why Choose Us

Professional epoxy flooring solutions backed by experience, quality materials, and attention to detail.

  • Licensed & Insured
  • On Time Completion
  • Professional Equipment
  • Custom Designs

Local Excellence

Transform Spaces Across the Tri-State

From residential garages to commercial facilities, we deliver professional epoxy flooring solutions throughout the Cincinnati tri-state area with quality you can trust.

Ohio

Hamilton County, Butler County Warren County, Clermont County, Adams County, Monroe County, Highland County, Pike County

Direction

Kentucky

Campbell County, Kenton County Boone County (Northern Kentucky)

Direction

Indiana

Dearborn County Southeast Indiana

Direction GET ESTIMATE

Why Choose Us?

Professional Service You Can Trust

Free Estimates No Hidden Costs

Quality Materials Premium Products Only

Quality Guaranteed Lasting Results

About Us

Request a Quote

Ready to transform your floors? Get your free estimate today!

Learn More From

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does epoxy flooring installation take?

Most residential garage floors can be completed in 1-2 days, depending on size and surface preparation needed. Commercial projects vary based on square footage and complexity.

How durable is epoxy flooring?

We use different resin systems depending on your needs. Epoxy systems are great for most applications, while polyaspartic and polyurea coatings offer enhanced durability, faster cure times, and better UV resistance. During your consultation, we’ll explain which system works best for your specific situation.

How do I maintain my epoxy floor?

Epoxy floors are low-maintenance. Regular sweeping and occasional mopping with mild detergent keeps them looking great. Avoid harsh chemicals and abrasive cleaners. We provide detailed care instructions with every installation.

Most residential garage floors can be completed in 1-2 days, depending on size and surface preparation needed. Commercial projects vary based on square footage and complexity.<\/p>","_id":"61e2064"},{"tab_title":"How durable is epoxy flooring?","tab_content":"

We use different resin systems depending on your needs. Epoxy systems are great for most applications, while polyaspartic and polyurea coatings offer enhanced durability, faster cure times, and better UV resistance. During your consultation, we'll explain which system works best for your specific situation.<\/p>","_id":"66f682d"},{"tab_title":"How do I maintain my epoxy floor?","tab_content":"

Epoxy floors are low-maintenance. Regular sweeping and occasional mopping with mild detergent keeps them looking great. Avoid harsh chemicals and abrasive cleaners. We provide detailed care instructions with every installation.<\/p>","_id":"eb4e844"}],"title_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"20","right":"20","bottom":"20","left":"20","isLinked":true},"icon_align":"right","icon_space":{"unit":"px","size":0,"sizes":[]},"_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"20","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"__globals__":{"title_background":"globals\/colors?id=astglobalcolor4","tab_active_color":"globals\/colors?id=astglobalcolor2","title_color":"globals\/colors?id=astglobalcolor3"},"title_typography_typography":"custom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"accordion"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: QCSC
item.dc:creator: z0iqo
item.content:encoded:
Transform Your Floor

Premium Floor Coatings

Founded in 2025, Queen City Surface Coatings LLC brings professional expertise and military precision to every project. As a veteran-owned business operated by John Leonard, a U.S. Marine Corps veteran based in Milford, Ohio, we serve the entire Cincinnati tri-state area with pride, dedication, and unwavering commitment to excellence.

Our Services Contact Us

Transform Your Space

Professional Quality You Can Trust

Founded in 2025 by veteran John Leonard, we bring meticulous attention to detail to every epoxy flooring project. Licensed, bonded, and insured for your peace of mind.

GET FREE ESTIMATE

2025

Founded & Growing

3

States Served

50+

Mile Service Area

100%

Satisfaction Guarantee

Our Services

Professional Floor Coatings

View All

Residential Epoxy Floors

Transform your garage, basement, or patio with durable, beautiful epoxy coatings. Custom colors and decorative options available to match your style and needs.

Commercial Solutions

Professional-grade coatings for businesses that need durability, safety, and style. Perfect for retail spaces, restaurants, and office buildings.

Industrial Coatings

Heavy-duty systems designed for manufacturing, warehouses, and high-traffic industrial environments with extreme chemical resistance.

Concrete Polishing

Professional concrete polishing services that create smooth, glossy surfaces perfect for modern commercial and residential spaces.

Surface Restoration

Repair and restore damaged concrete surfaces before applying new coatings. We handle cracks, stains, and surface preparation.

Custom Design

Create unique floors with metallic finishes, decorative flakes, and custom color combinations tailored to your vision and space.

Quality Guarantee

Committed To Excellence In Every Project

item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

item.title: The Complete Guide to Epoxy Flooring in Cincinnati: Transform Your Space with Confidence
item.dc:creator: jonlan
item.content:encoded:
Hey there, Cincinnati neighbor! If you're like many homeowners I talk to, you're probably tired of looking at that stained, cracked concrete floor in your garage or basement. Between our brutal winters, humid summers, and everything Mother Nature throws at us here in the Queen City, our concrete floors really take a beating.

As someone who's installed hundreds of epoxy floors across Greater Cincinnati, I'm excited to share everything you need to know about transforming your space with an epoxy floor coating that can handle whatever Ohio weather dishes out.

Why Cincinnati Property Owners Are Choosing Epoxy Flooring

The Harsh Reality of Ohio Weather on Concrete

Let's be honest - Cincinnati's freeze-thaw cycles are brutal on concrete. One day it's 20°F, the next it's 50°F, and that constant expansion and contraction wreaks havoc on unprotected floors. Add in the road salt that gets tracked in during winter, and you've got a recipe for concrete deterioration.

That's why more Cincinnati homeowners are turning to epoxy flooring as a permanent solution. A properly installed epoxy coating creates an impermeable barrier that protects your concrete from moisture, chemicals, and temperature swings.

Local Success Stories & Transformations

Just last month, we transformed a Hyde Park garage that had been damaged by years of salt exposure. The homeowner was amazed at how the new epoxy floor not only looked incredible but also made the space feel bigger and brighter. The metallic copper finish we installed actually complemented their Tudor-style home perfectly.

Understanding Epoxy Flooring Benefits for Cincinnati Properties

Year-Round Protection from Freeze-Thaw Cycles

Unlike bare concrete, epoxy creates a seamless, waterproof surface that prevents moisture from penetrating and causing damage during our notorious freeze-thaw cycles. This means:

  • No more concrete spalling or cracking in winter
  • Protection from road salt damage
  • Resistance to oil, gasoline, and chemical spills
  • Easy snow shovel cleanup without surface damage

Enhanced Home Value in Greater Cincinnati Market

Working with local realtors, we've seen how a professional epoxy floor installation can boost property appeal. In competitive neighborhoods like Mason and West Chester, a finished garage with premium epoxy flooring helps properties stand out to buyers who appreciate quality upgrades.

Choosing the Right Epoxy System for Your Cincinnati Property

Residential Options (Garage, Basement, Workshop)

For Cincinnati homes, we typically recommend:

  • Garages: Full-broadcast systems with UV stability for maximum durability
  • Basements: Moisture-mitigating systems to handle our humid climate
  • Workshops: Chemical-resistant finishes for ultimate protection

Climate-Specific Considerations

Cincinnati's weather demands specific epoxy formulations. We use systems designed to:

  • Cure properly in high humidity conditions
  • Maintain flexibility during temperature swings
  • Resist yellowing from UV exposure
  • Handle extreme temperature ranges (-20°F to 120°F)

Installation Process & Timing in Cincinnati's Climate

Best Seasons for Installation

While we can install year-round thanks to climate-controlled preparation, spring and fall offer ideal conditions in Cincinnati. We typically recommend:

  • March-May: Perfect temps for curing
  • September-November: Low humidity, stable temperatures
  • Summer: Early morning installations to avoid extreme heat
  • Winter: Heated workspace requirements

Maintaining Your Epoxy Floor in Cincinnati

Seasonal Care Tips

To keep your epoxy floor looking showroom-fresh through Cincinnati's seasons:

  • Winter: Use rubber mats for salt collection
  • Spring: Quick cleanup of pollen and rain
  • Summer: Occasional pressure washing
  • Fall: Regular leaf and debris removal

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does epoxy flooring last in Cincinnati's climate?

With proper installation and maintenance, our epoxy floors typically last 15-20 years in residential applications. Commercial floors in high-traffic areas may need refreshing after 10-15 years.

What's the cost compared to other local flooring options?

While prices vary by project, most Cincinnati residential garage floors range from $6-12 per square foot, depending on the system chosen. This is often more cost-effective long-term than repeated concrete sealing or tile installation.

Can epoxy be installed in winter?

Yes! We use climate control systems and specialized low-temperature products to ensure proper curing even during Cincinnati winters.

Ready to Transform Your Space?

If you're ready to say goodbye to dull, damaged concrete, we'd love to help. As your neighbors here in Cincinnati, we understand the unique challenges our local climate presents and how to address them properly.

Contact Queen City Surface Coatings today for:

  • Free, no-pressure consultation
  • Detailed quote with multiple options
  • Expert advice on the best system for your needs

Call John at (513) 296-5525 or visit queencitysurfacecoatings.com to schedule your free consultation.

Additional Frequently Asked Questions

How much does epoxy flooring typically cost in Cincinnati? Is it worth the investment?

In the Greater Cincinnati area, professional epoxy floor installations typically range from $6-12 per square foot, depending on the system chosen and floor condition. For an average 2-car garage (400-500 sq ft), expect to invest between $2,400-6,000. While this may seem significant compared to DIY paint kits, professional epoxy systems last 15+ years with proper maintenance, making them cost-effective long-term investments, especially considering our harsh Ohio winters and humid summers.

How long does the installation process take, and can it be done during winter in Cincinnati?

A professional installation typically takes 2-3 days from start to finish, with your floor being fully usable after 24 hours of the final coat. While we can install year-round thanks to climate-controlled equipment, we recommend scheduling between March and November when temperatures are more stable. Cincinnati's humidity levels can affect curing times, so we carefully monitor conditions during installation.

Will epoxy flooring handle the freeze-thaw cycles we get in Cincinnati? What about road salt damage?

Professional-grade epoxy systems are specifically designed to withstand Ohio's extreme temperature swings and are resistant to road salt damage that's common in Cincinnati winters. The key is proper installation with moisture mitigation systems and high-quality products rated for our climate zone. Unlike paint-based coatings, true epoxy systems create a chemical bond with the concrete that won't peel or delaminate from seasonal changes.

How does epoxy compare to those DIY kits I see at Home Depot on Beechmont Avenue?

Store-bought epoxy kits contain only 40-50% solids content and minimal thickness, while professional systems use 100% solids and are 2-3 times thicker. Professional installations include diamond grinding preparation (not just acid etching), moisture testing, and crack repair - steps that aren't possible with DIY kits. While a DIY kit might last 1-2 years in our climate, professional systems typically last 15+ years.

What maintenance is required to keep epoxy floors looking good in our climate?

Maintenance is minimal - regular sweeping and occasional mopping with a pH-neutral cleaner is typically all that's needed. For Cincinnati garages, we recommend a thorough cleaning in spring after winter salt exposure. The non-porous surface resists staining from automotive fluids and won't harbor mold or mildew even in our humid summers.

I've heard epoxy gets slippery when wet - is this true? What about garage drainage?

While untreated epoxy can be slippery when wet, we include anti-slip additives in the final coat to provide traction that meets or exceeds OSHA standards. We also ensure proper slope toward your garage drainage points and can install additional drainage solutions if needed. This is especially important in Cincinnati where we get significant rainfall and snow melt.

Can epoxy flooring increase my home's resale value in the Cincinnati market?

While epoxy flooring typically won't dramatically increase your home's appraisal value, local realtors report that it creates strong buyer appeal, especially in premium markets like Indian Hill, Montgomery, and Mason. A professionally coated garage floor can be a distinguishing feature that helps your home stand out, particularly among buyers looking for move-in ready properties with high-end finishes.
item.excerpt:encoded: Transform your garage or basement with premium epoxy floor coatings in Cincinnati. Get a durable, showroom-quality finish backed by a lifetime warranty. Schedule your free consultation today.
